mapper.select: select s.SH_ID, SH_NAME, SH_ADDR, MENU, induty_code_se_name, SH_RCMN, SH_LIKE, SH_PHOTO, MIN(PRICE) AS PRICE from store s join review r on s.sh_id = r.sh_id where s.sh_addr like concat('%',#{searchText},'%') group by sh_id order by sh_rcmn desc;
mapper.update: UPDATE review SET rcontent=#{rcontent}, rdate=now() where rkey=#{rkey}
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM review join member on review.mkey = member.mkey WHERE sh_id=#{sh_id} ORDER BY relike limit 1
SELECT * FROM review r INNER JOIN store s ON r.sh_id = s.sh_id join member m on r.mkey= m.mkey order by rkey asc;
SELECT *,(select count(*) from REVIEW_LIKE where mkey = #{mk}) as isLike FROM review r INNER JOIN store s ON r.sh_id = s.sh_id join member m on r.mkey= m.mkey order by rkey asc;
SELECT * FROM review r INNER JOIN store s ON r.sh_id = s.sh_id join member m on r.mkey= m.mkey where r.sh_id=#{sh_id} order by r.rkey asc;
UPDATE review SET relike=relike+1 where rkey=#{rkey}
UPDATE review SET relike=relike-1 where rkey=#{rkey}
